comments.raw_text: If we somehow manage to get into this state of restoreHistoryPrecursor with 0 tabs, after bug 628270 we won't be going into restoreHistory and with the patch that was there, weren't explicitly sending the SSWindowStateReady event. But the tests were all passing, so there's no test for that. We should have one.
